REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f8971 reute r f BC-DELTA-NATURAL-GAS-<DG 03-18 0061

TEXT.TITLE: DELTA NATURAL GAS <DGAS> SELLS DEBENTURES
TEXT.BODY: Delta Natural Gas Co Inc is raising 14 mln dlrs through an offering of debentures due 2007 with an 8-5/8 pct coupon and par pricing, said sole manager Edward D. Jones and Co. That is 110 basis points more than the yield of comparable Treasury securities. The issue is non-callable for five years. Reuter
